info.name: ownCloud X Enterprise Theme
info.summary: Equip your ownCloud instance with the official ownCloud X Enterprise Theme
info.description: ownCloud X marks a new generation of ownCloud focussing on security, performance and productivity. Reflect the latest version within your ownCloud instance and get the ownCloud X Enterprise Theme. With some updates within our UI we offer an even more intuitive user experience for all ownCloud Enterprise users.
info.author: ownCloud GmbH / Philipp Schaffrath, Felix Heidecke
